name: Command (MadeByDavid)
description:
In this game, you control a machine. 

A machine built by a flat-earth rebel group.

Your task is a simple, but not easy.

Keep the machine alive until extraction.

This game was made in days, and is my first game published. 

I hope you like it, and I  plan on publishing a lot more.

Let me know what you think in the comments below.

PS: Multiple endings available.

David.

______________________________________________________________________________________
